title: Ai to Aiko: Love Can Happen Anywhere

alternative_titles.ja: 哀Ai to Ai愛 - Love Can Happen Anywhere

synopsis:
Love Can Happen Anywhere, or originally titled as '哀Ai to Ai愛' is Ai & Aiko's first animation film. Done in stop-motion, it reflects life and how in facing problems that stop us, we should keep moving in small steps for every small move propels change.

(Source: Official Youtube channel)
